# Issue #036: Developer Tools (Config Editor and Debugger)

**Phase:** Phase 4 - Scale & Governance  
**Weeks:** 25-26  
**Component:** Tools  
**Estimated Effort:** 8 days  
**Priority:** Medium  
**Labels:** phase-4, tools, developer-experience

## Description
Build developer tools including a visual configuration editor/builder, page preview tool, widget documentation browser, action debugger, and configuration validator.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Visual configuration editor/builder
- [ ] Page preview tool with hot reload
- [ ] Widget documentation browser
- [ ] Interactive widget playground
- [ ] Action debugger (step-through execution)
- [ ] Configuration validator with error reporting
- [ ] Mock data generator
- [ ] Schema documentation generator
- [ ] Configuration templates library
- [ ] Code generation from visual editor

## Features
- Drag-and-drop page builder
- Widget property editor
- Action flow visualizer
- Datasource configuration UI
- Real-time preview
- Export/import configurations

## Dependencies
- Depends on: All Phase 1-3 components

## Deliverables
- Configuration editor tool
- Preview tool
- Action debugger
- Validator tool
- Documentation
